CustomField.formula: IF( TAD_Order__r.RecordType.Name == 'TNZ' || TAD_Order__r.RecordType.Name=='WT', IF(Order_Line_Item__r.isSplit__c = true, Order_Line_Item__r.Initial_HSS_NZ_Amount__c , departures_dates__r.HSS_amount_nz__c) , IF(TAD_Order__r.RecordType.Name == 'TAD' || TAD_Order__r.RecordType.Name=='TC' , IF(Order_Line_Item__r.isSplit__c = true, Order_Line_Item__r.Initial_HSS_Amount__c , departures_dates__r.HSS_amount__c) , 0) )
CustomField.label: HSS Amount
